boardgame.name: 10 Days in the USA
美國十日遊
boardgame.description: You have 10 Days in the USA. Travel the country by jet, car, and on foot. Plan your trip from start to finish using destination and transportation tiles. With a little luck and clever planning, you just might outwit your fellow travelers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the first installment in the 10 Days in series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are 50 state tiles, 10 colored airplane tiles, and 6 car tiles. Players all flip tiles one at a time, examine them, and put them in the 10 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;days_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of their tile tray, in any order. Then in turn, they draw a tile from one of three face-up piles or a face-down pile. The new tile may replace one tile in their tray, with that tile (or the unused drawn tile) discarded onto any of the face-up piles. Alternatively, players may swap any two tiles in their tray. When a player has all their days connected correctly, they win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Travel Connections:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By Foot - bordering state tiles may be placed side-by-side_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By Automobile - states may be connected by driving through a third state which borders them both (the car tile is put between them)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By Air - Two states of the same color may be connected by a same-color airplane placed between them_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGB Volume 6 - Session Review with Railroad Tycoon, 10 Days in Europe, Shear Panic in brief and Sequence Dice (?!?)

This is still in the shrinkwrap. It’s a great game, but I already have an opened copy which we play with. We thoroughly enjoy playing it. Out of the Box (OBG 1011) Another destination in the 10-Days Travel Series. You have 10 Days in the USA - Travel the country by jet, car, and on foot. Plan your trip from start to finish using destination and transportation tiles. With a little luck and clever planning, you just might outwit your fellow travelers. The first traveler to make connections for their 10 day journey wins the game.

Mint and still in shrink wrap. Shipping charge will be an estimate of the actual cost of shipping the game to you. That means I can usually reduce shipping charges if you buy more than one of my games -- Send me a message and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll calculate the discount.
